rules_text:
Whenever Ephemeral Elk attacks, exile it at end of combat with a time counter on it.
Suspend 2–{W}{W} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {W}{W} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]
